title: Collaborative Learning Workshop for Activity-Based Anatomy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of human anatomy and understanding of surface anatomy concepts
context.additional_context: Practical anatomy education program for office workers in a digitally enabled environment.

learning_goals: Learners can visually analyze the 3D structure of internal organs drawn on the human body surface.
Learners can accurately identify five or more palpation points through peer assessment.
Learners can achieve mastery of at least 80% in formative assessments of anatomical knowledge through collaborative activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
